nodes.text: Squad Four was a unit of Imperial stormtroopers assigned to the M-class Imperial Attack Transport Regina Cayli during the Galactic Civil War.

Squad Four was featured in the roleplaying adventure "Regina Cayli", first published in Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game by West End Games in 1987. It was subsequently reprinted in the first issue of the Star Wars Adventure Journal in 1994.

Due to the nature of the adventure, it is possible for the player to never encounter Squad Four as they are only called upon if the player, as Roark Garnet, is discovered while infiltrating the Regina Cayli.
